hypothesis_content.title: News-Induced Breakout Fade with Volume Decay
hypothesis_content.statement: Breakouts driven solely by news headlines (no technical precedent) that show volume decay within 2 hours will fully retrace 92% of the time when traded against the initial move.
hypothesis_content.rationale: News-driven moves without technical foundation often represent emotional reactions. Volume decay indicates lack of sustained institutional participation. Recent 'death cross' news fits this pattern.
entry_conditions: >3% move within 30 minutes of major news headline
No preceding technical setup (no support/resistance, no volatility compression)
Volume spikes then decays to <80% of spike volume within 2 hours
Price remains within 1.5% of spike extreme

exit_conditions.time_exit: 24 hours if neither TP nor SL hit

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: News breakouts with volume decay continue in original direction >35% of time, or institutional flow data shows sustained participation despite volume metrics.
